name: Core Defender (itch) (hadiDanial)
description:
**SWITCH WEAPONS IN ORDER TO ACTIVATE THEM**

Intruders detected. You must protect the power cores and prevent them from reaching and destroying the precious databank!

You are a defense bot tasked with protecting the databank. Will you be able to prevent the invaders from destroying it? Protect the power crystals to keep them from winning!

Controls: 
Movement on the rails: A/D or arrow keys
Aiming: Mouse
Shooting: Left Mouse Button,  Spacebar,  X
Switching weapons: Q/E or Z/C

This was made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 47.
